Source are not include here, you should read and get a license from Microsoft
http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/en/details.aspx?FamilyID=285eeffd-d86c-48c3-ab93-3abd5ee7f1ce&displaylang=en

The porting kit can be also compiled well with gcc in Linux.
I also include a qt and gdk-pixbuf2 plugin here.
